thread.title: Bill OReilly
thread.title_full: Life Ionizers reviewed by Bill OReilly

author: Bill OReilly
title: Bill OReilly
text: I've been using the countertop 9100 ionizer for over 5 years my experience has been amazing I drink a lot of tea one tea bag makes 10 cups of tea with my alkaline machine also I water my house-plants with the water from the alkaline machine and my plants flower 3 to 4 times a year it's the best machine I ever bought for myself
